Title: "Stopword Removal in Azure Cognitive Search: Language-Specific Lists"
Text:
C:\Users\adamh\Downloads\azure-search.pdfStopword removal applies to all supported Lucene and Microsoft analyzers used inAzure Cognitive Search.This article lists the stopwords used by the Microsoft analyzer for each language.For the stopword list for Lucene analyzers, see the Apache Lucene source code onGitHub.
هﺬھ اﺬھ ﺎﻣ ﻻ ﻊﻣ ىﺬﻟا يﺬﻟا ﻦﻋ ﻰﺘﻟا ﻲﺘﻟا ﻰﻟإ ﻰﻟا
ﻰﻠﻋ نإ نأ نا ﻦﻣ ﻰﻓ ﻲﻓﺖﻧﺎﻛ ﺮﯿﻏ ﺬﻨﻣ ﺎﻤﻛ ﻞﺒﻗ ﻮھ
ﻰﻓو ﻲﻓو ﻚﻟذ و وأ وا ﻞﻛ ﮫﻧأ ﮫﻧا ﮫﻧإ نﺎﻛ ﻢﻟ ﺪﻌﺑﺎﻀﯾأ نود ﮫﻟ ﻦﻜﻟ لﻮﺣ ﻦﻣو ﻦﯾﺬﻟا ﻮھو ﻰھ ﻲھ ﺪﻗ ﺎﮭﯿﻓ
